Job Description:
Position:   
  Software developer 
   Responsibilities  Senior level developer who will be responsible for development and implementation of complex application integration on diverse platforms  Experience Required  2 -  5 years  Expected Technical Skills:   
 
  Strong shell programming and C systems programming skills on UNIX platform with 2- 5 years of experience. UNIX knowledge is must. 
  Exposure to system administration,  storage domain and knowledge of storage software is preferred,  but not a must. 
  Candidate should have excellent communication and presentation skills,  both written and oral 
  Strong organizational skills,  attention to detail,  ability to take initiative 
  Strong leadership,  problem solving and communication skills are essential for success in this position 
  Ability to support by carrying support cell and resolving issues during non- business hours
PG: Any Postgraduate in Any Specialization, MCA in Computers
